chip: Claude could respond as someone specific
description: Has Claude simulate a specific person, role, or perspective to provide targeted feedback or practice. Surface when user is preparing for a conversation, wants feedback from a particular viewpoint, is trying to understand how someone might react, or is practicing or rehearsing. Satisfied when user asks Claude to adopt a persona using phrases like: pretend you're, respond as, act like, if you were my, simulate, play the role of, as a [role].
